forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 6 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends on Downtown San Francisco, the lingering daylight casts a gentle hue across the cityscape. The air, crisp yet inviting, carries that characteristic bite, hinting at the coolness that evening will usher in. Currently, the skyline is etched against a backdrop of partly cloudy skies, revealing brief glimpses of soft blue. The west wind, smooth and unhurried, dances lightly through the streets, bringing a refreshing contrast to the day’s warmth.

As the night advances, temperatures will hover around a mild 50 degrees. Given the forecast of a mostly sunny Saturday to follow, one might anticipate a delightful opportunity to embrace the outdoors tomorrow. This evening, however, wraps the city in a comfortable embrace, perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero or settling into a cozy café with friends. A light jacket or sweater will serve well, shielding against the chill without stifling the spirit of the evening. As for activities, consider a peaceful walk near the waterfront, savoring the soft glow of the city lights mirrored in the bay, or finding a tranquil spot to contemplate the stillness that envelops this vibrant metropolis on the cusp of night.
